fields.name: Theon Greyjoy
fields.description: If you are defending an area that contains either a Stronghold or a Castle, this card gains +1 combat strength and a sword icon.

fields.name: Victarion Greyjoy
fields.description: If you are attacking, all of your participating ships (including supporting Greyoy ships) add +2 to combat stength instead of +1.

fields.name: Aeron Damphair
fields.description: You may immediately discard two of your available Power tokens to discard Aeron Damphair and choose a different House Card from your hand (if able).

fields.name: Asha Greyjoy
fields.description: If you are not being supported in this round, this card gains two sword icons and one fortification icon.

fields.name: Balon Greyjoy
fields.description: The printed combat strength of your opponent's House card is reduced to 0.
